title: Drawing, "Ceiling Design, History, Abundance in Six Ovals, Sala di Ercole ed Ebe, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
dimensions:
19.1 x 32.1 cm (7 1/2 x 12 5/8 in.)
dims. vary widely
Mat:  35.6 x 45.7 cm (14 x 18 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
Eight ovals, two rows: 1) winged female figure, in pose of History, writing upon a tablet 2) Abundance supporting cornucopia with both hands 3) Fame running with trumpet and wreath 7) Fame walking with torch in her
right hand, wreath in left  8) Fame dancing toward left, playing trumpet

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Ceiling Design, History, Abundance in Six Ovals, Sala di Ercole ed Ebe, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813.Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1278.
